short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find out when your favorite streamers are live!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension that allows you to receive notifications in your browser when one of your favorite streamers is live on Twitch.

Just open it, write their name and add them! (Or press the button that will appear if you are already in their broadcast)
